name: Sword & Slither: Scourge Of The Cardboard Kingdom
name_original: Sword & Slither: Scourge Of The Cardboard Kingdom
description:
Help Orville, the world's cutest wannabe bad-guy, fulfill his dream of becoming a dragon! Soar through skies and unleash your molten fury on the Cardboard Kingdom!

We hope you enjoy this game as much as we enjoyed making it!

Much love,

Dan and Jared - (Kitchen Synk Studios)

Notes:

Controls: 

WASD to Move

Mouse to Look

Space to Jump/Flap

LMB to Pick Up

RMB to Drop

Performance Issues:

Try using FireFox for increased fps in WebGl
